Pune, India: Python and JS developers.

Who dis? - We are styloot.com, one of the largest online fashion stores for women. We have created a patented visual search, which is our bee's knees. We carry 500K+ items from 5000+ designers.

Who you? - We are looking to hire Python Programmers and Javascript programmers for our core engineering team. You will be working directly with the product and will be making decisions that directly influence the site. You need to have worked 2-3 years, have a github portfolio, and come from a strong coding background. Other than that, it does not matter where or what you studied.
